remarks:
Addition to zero.  Remark in proof of Theorem 4K(2) of [Enderton] p. 81.  Note:  In this and later theorems, we deliberately avoid the more general ordinal versions of these theorems (in this case ~ oa0r ) so that we can avoid ~ ax-rep , which is not needed for finite recursive definitions.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-1995.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2014.)
